name: Ants Ants Ants
description:
Ants Ants Ants!

The Black Queen is under heavy attack, defend her at all cost!

Every 10 seconds an ant spawns, choose between a worker, scout or warrior ant to protect your queen and find food.

Each Ant needs food to survive which is paid during the upkeep (also every 10 seconds). If you cannot pay the upkeep cost, the queen slowly dies.

Upgrade your ants to gain an advantage in combat but make sure you save enough food to pay the upkeep.

Can you defeat all 10 waves and the Red Queen herself?
